descriptionHtml:
[center]

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=7][color=#ff0000][i]CAINS RETREAT[/i][/color][/SIZE][/font][/b]


[size=4]Updated to V 1.2[/size][/center]

[center] [img] http://i.imgur.com/2LjVhx4.jpg] [/img] [/center]
[center][font=Century Gothic][size=5][i]Located Outside Autumnshade Clearing[/i][/size][/font][/center]
[center] [img] http://i.imgur.com/5HZZ3mi.jpg] [/img] [/center]

[line]

[center] [color=#00B050][font=Arial Black][size=5]DESCRIPTION[/size][/font][/color] [/center]
[center]I started this as an attempt to teach myself how to mod with the creation kit and i got carried away
the house has undergone some revisions so sadly i have spent way way way too much time on it
(but now i know how not to waste time next time Lolz)

[line]

[color=#00b050][font=Arial Black][size=5]REQUIREMENTS[/size][/font][/color]

DAWNGUARD DLC
HEARTHFIRES DLC
DRAGONBORN DLC

RECOMMENDED: I used the Whiterun/Solitude/Winterhold Sexy City's Textures by horrorview [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3417809/] link [/url]
You will have to download them separately

[line]

[size=5][color=#00b050][font=Arial Black]INSTRUCTIONS [/font][/color][/size]

Instructions: Install with NMM or extract files manually to your data folder

[line]

[size=5][font=Arial Black][color=#00b050]IMPORTANT READ ME[/color][/font][/size]

The Outside of the House is not Navmeshed I'm Looking for someone to Help me with that.
Some of the interior cells are navmeshed for the mannequins but i made some paths around the house so i deleted some navmesh.


If you have floating grass or rocks in the yard, its a bethesda BUG i think

Open up both Skyrim.ini and SkyrimPrefs.ini and at the bottom of the [Grass] section add/alter this

bAllowLoadGrass=0
bAllowCreateGrass=1
bDrawShaderGrass=1

source: [url=http://www.creationkit.com/Floating_Grass_Fix] http://www.creationkit.com/Floating_Grass_Fix [/url]

[line]

[color=#00b050][font=Arial Black][size=5]CREDITS[/size][/font][/color]

THANX TO BLARY ESPECIALLY FOR ALL YOUR NICE RESOURCES.

AND BIG THANX TO MY DAD (AGE 55) WHO HELPED TEST IT.

Ingredients in a Jar Resource by Blary [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30605/] Ingredients in a Jar [/url]

OpenBooks Resource by Blary [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14134/] OpenBook Resource [/url]

FoodContainer Resource by Blary [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14133/] Food Containers Resource [/url]

Tagged Chest Resource by Blary [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14133/] Tagged Chest Resource [/url]

Paintings and Frames by Artisanix [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17423/] Paintings and Frames [/url]

Modders Resource Pack by by Oaristys and Tony67 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16525/] Modders Resource Pack [/url]

[line]

[color=#00b050][font=Arial Black][size=5]RECOMMENDED MODS [/size][/font][/color]


Sexy Whiterun v3 by horrorview [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7059/] Sexy Whiterun v3 [/url]

Sexy Windhelm v2 by horrorview [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7178/] Sexy Windhelm v2 [/url]

Divine Talos Statue by skyrimaguas and jeclxohko [url=Divine Talos Statue - HD 2K and Ultra-HD 4K Texture by skyrimaguas and jeclxohko] Divine Talos Statue - HD2K and Ultra-HD 4K Texture [/url][/center]
